Welcome to iompar The all-round transportation app for Ireland. Use app in Irish Gaelic What\'s your name? Your name This can be changed later under settings Payment Preference I pay using cash I pay using Leap Leap Information Leap cards make transport quicker, easier, and cheaper.\n\nMake sure to register it online so you can access your balance here. What now? iompar helps you track your public transport and expenditures intelligently.\n\nMonitor your spending and never miss that journey again.
